title: Awesome List Updates on May 10, 2025
_seo_title: Awesome List Updates on May 10, 2025 - Track Awesome List

items.title: Awesome Angular
items.content_text:
### CLI / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [angular-parallel-test-runner (⭐1)](https://github.com/mahdi-hajian/angular-parallel-test-runner) - A command-line tool designed to run Angular tests in parallel across multiple projects. It utilizes the concurrency capabilities of your machine, maximizing the efficiency of running tests by leveraging multiple CPU cores.

### Notifications / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [grand-notifications (⭐1)](https://github.com/rishi-rj-s/grand-notifications) - Beautiful, customizable toast notifications with artistic animations.

### Scroll / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [simplebar (⭐6.3k)](https://github.com/Grsmto/simplebar) - Custom scrollbars vanilla JavaScript library with native scroll, done simple, lightweight, easy to use and cross-browser.

### Ionic / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [ionic-state (⭐1)](https://github.com/godenji/ionic-state) - Provides utilities for working with state in Ionic applications.
items.content_html:
CLI / Google Developer Experts

  • angular-parallel-test-runner (⭐1) - A command-line tool designed to run Angular tests in parallel across multiple projects. It utilizes the concurrency capabilities of your machine, maximizing the efficiency of running tests by leveraging multiple CPU cores.

Notifications / Google Developer Experts

  • grand-notifications (⭐1) - Beautiful, customizable toast notifications with artistic animations.

Scroll / Google Developer Experts

  • simplebar (⭐6.3k) - Custom scrollbars vanilla JavaScript library with native scroll, done simple, lightweight, easy to use and cross-browser.

Ionic / Google Developer Experts

  • ionic-state (⭐1) - Provides utilities for working with state in Ionic applications.

items.title: Awesome Transit
items.content_text:
### Native Apps (closed source) / Rust

*   [ÖPNV Navigator](https://navigatorapp.net/)

### SDKs / Rust

*   [TripKit (⭐100)](https://github.com/alexander-albers/tripkit) - TripKit is a Swift-library to get data from public transport providers.
items.content_html:
Native Apps (closed source) / Rust

  • ÖPNV Navigator

SDKs / Rust

  • TripKit (⭐100) - TripKit is a Swift-library to get data from public transport providers.

items.title: Awesome Langchain
items.content_text:
### Tools / Services

*   [UQLM (⭐776)](https://github.com/cvs-health/uqlm): UQLM: Uncertainty Quantification for Language Models, is a Python library for LLM hallucination detection using state-of-the-art uncertainty quantification techniques ![GitHub Repo stars](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/cvs-health/uqlm?style=social)

### Other LLM Frameworks / Videos Playlists

*   [TensorZero (⭐8.5k)](https://github.com/tensorzero/tensorzero): An open-source framework for building production-grade LLM applications. It unifies an LLM gateway, observability, optimization, evaluations, and experimentation. ![GitHub Repo stars](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/tensorzero/tensorzero?style=social)
items.content_html:
Tools / Services

  • UQLM (⭐776): UQLM: Uncertainty Quantification for Language Models, is a Python library for LLM hallucination detection using state-of-the-art uncertainty quantification techniques

Other LLM Frameworks / Videos Playlists

  • TensorZero (⭐8.5k): An open-source framework for building production-grade LLM applications. It unifies an LLM gateway, observability, optimization, evaluations, and experimentation.

items.title: Awesome Selfhosted
items.content_text:
### Software / Analytics

*   [Daily Stars Explorer](https://emanuelef.github.io/daily-stars-explorer) `⚠` - Track GitHub repo trends with daily star insights to see growth and community interest over time. ([Demo](https://emanuelef.github.io/daily-stars-explorer), [Source Code (⭐231)](https://github.com/emanuelef/daily-stars-explorer)) `MIT` `Go/Nodejs/Docker`

### Software / Document Management - E-books

*   [Kapowarr](https://casvt.github.io/Kapowarr/) - Build and manage a comic book library. Download, rename, move and convert issues of the volume to your liking. ([Source Code (⭐628)](https://github.com/Casvt/Kapowarr)) `GPL-3.0` `Docker/Python`
items.content_html:
Software / Analytics

  • Daily Stars Explorer ⚠ - Track GitHub repo trends with daily star insights to see growth and community interest over time. (Demo, Source Code (⭐231)) MIT Go/Nodejs/Docker

Software / Document Management - E-books

  • Kapowarr - Build and manage a comic book library. Download, rename, move and convert issues of the volume to your liking. (Source Code (⭐628)) GPL-3.0 Docker/Python

items.title: Awesome Eslint
items.content_text:
### Plugins / Code Quality

*   [De Morgan (⭐278)](https://github.com/azat-io/eslint-plugin-de-morgan) - Transforms logical expressions in code to make them easier to understand.

### Plugins / CSS in JS

*   [vanilla-extract (⭐27)](https://github.com/antebudimir/eslint-plugin-vanilla-extract) - An ESLint plugin for enforcing CSS property ordering in [vanilla-extract CSS (⭐10k)](https://github.com/vanilla-extract-css/vanilla-extract) styles.

### Plugins / Style

*   [split-and-sort-imports (⭐0)](https://github.com/sngn/eslint-plugin-split-and-sort-imports) - Sorts imports and splits 'multiple' imports into single line imports.
*   [@gitbutler/no-relative-imports](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@gitbutler/no-relative-imports) - Use paths from tsconfig and auto fix relative paths to aliases. Observes tsconfig inheritance.

### Tutorials / Testing Tools

*   [Dear Old ESLint](https://adropincalm.com/blog/dear-old-eslint/) - Quick intro article on ESLint.
items.content_html:
Plugins / Code Quality

  • De Morgan (⭐278) - Transforms logical expressions in code to make them easier to understand.

Plugins / CSS in JS

  • vanilla-extract (⭐27) - An ESLint plugin for enforcing CSS property ordering in vanilla-extract CSS (⭐10k) styles.

Plugins / Style

  • split-and-sort-imports (⭐0) - Sorts imports and splits 'multiple' imports into single line imports.
  • @gitbutler/no-relative-imports - Use paths from tsconfig and auto fix relative paths to aliases. Observes tsconfig inheritance.

Tutorials / Testing Tools

  • Dear Old ESLint - Quick intro article on ESLint.
